name: Destroyer of Worlds
storyline: You are an adventurer who needs to make his way through dangerous dungeons and to get home. On your way there will be monsters who want to destroy this world. At your disposal is not only your dexterity, but also an arsenal of firearms. On the way, you can find a second pistol, submachine gun, or shotgun. Not only enemies will be on your way, but also doors that open with certain keys. After passing all the tests, and overcoming all the difficulties, you will win. Go ahead adventurer!
summary: Destroyer of Worlds is a 2D platformer game about an adventurer who needs to make his way through dangerous dungeons and to get home.
